snippet: The Outdoor Voices crew has adopted certain endorphin-pumping office practices, which they share with T.
abstract: Staff at activewear line Outdoor Voices, who play monthly game of basketball in Manhattan's Chinatown, offer their thoughts on how to stay active at work on a daily basis.
lead_paragraph: The Outdoor Voices crew has adopted certain endorphin-pumping office practices, which they share with T.

headline.main: For One Apparel Brand, Staying Fit Is Just Part of the Job
